laboratory_examinations.findings: Metabolic acidosis compensated by hypocapnia (pH 7.366, PCO2 29 mm Hg, PO2 114 mm Hg, base excess 27.6 mmol/L, and HCO3 16.2 mmol/L).
High serum lactate (66.2 mg/dL, normal range 4–16 mg/dL) and pyruvate (3.72 mg/dL, normal range 0.3–0.9 mg/dL).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to ranges of lactate 15.9 to 35.3 mg/dL and pyruvate 0.78 to 1.32 mg/dL during the patient’s hospital stay.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mutation from A to G at the nucleotide pair 3243 of mitochondrial tRNA Leu(UUR) gene in the blood.
Increased regional CBF in the parietooccipital region corresponding to the lesion during the strokelike episodes; relative hypovascularization confirmed 2 months later.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial hyperperfusion during acute episodes followed by hypoperfusion and slightly decreased perfusion in the previously hyperperfused area after 2 months.
